name: Twooter Tycooter
description:
Like or Ratio the Twoots that appear to recover your Twooter clout after losing it due to falling off!

Select one of 3 Tweets at any given moment and give your opinion on them to the world, be sure to make reactions that are agreeable to the world to get people to like you, and collect as many stans as you can without getting any of the haters!

To play, download and extract the zip file and run Twooter Tycooter.exe

Have fun :)

- Jawdat & Alex

Thanks to Sam, Alikay and Gabby for the tweet suggestions.
